snippet.title: Pikmin 1 Randomizer [Trailer]
snippet.description:
Join Captain Olimar and the Pikmin in a new take on the first Pikmin adventure!  This new hack randomizes enemies and bosses to create a new experience for long-time fans.

For more information and to download, visit the Github page:
https://github.com/Minty-Meeo/Pikmin-1-Randomizer-Gecko

Want to learn more about Pikmin hacking?  Visit Hocotate Hacker!
https://discord.gg/G7Pgkdh

Edit 4/1/2023
I have often been asked if this, that, and the other things can be added to this randomizer.  Pikmin Randomizer started as an experiment using Gecko codes.  By the end, I had pushed Gecko codes to their limits, quite literally, as there was very little memory left in the Gecko codehandler.  After the v2 release, I was actually in the process of porting the hack to C-Kit and doing some decompilation work on relevant generator code, but became distracted by improving C-Kit itself, then other projects grabbed my attention, and eventually I lost most motivation to get anything done with hacking.  I still think about the lost potential all the time.  I still tell myself I will return to it some day.  Maybe I will, who knows.  So basically, I'm sorry I fell off and failed to deliver a better randomizer.
